definition: to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: Restaurant light box production must have characteristics, to attract customers.
sentences.chinese: 餐廳燈箱製作肯定要具有特色，要做到吸引顧客。

sentences.english: The restaurant receives hundreds of customers every day.
sentences.chinese: 這家飯店每天接待數以百計的顧客。

sentences.english: Maybe some newsy remembers an odd customer.
sentences.chinese: 也許哪個賣報的還記得這麼個古怪的顧客。

sentences.english: Our Salute Brand Coffee is the most popular beverages offered in the market.
sentences.chinese: 海軍牌咖啡，味道香農可口，最受顧客喜愛。

sentences.english: The grocer studies to please his customers.
sentences.chinese: 雜貨商老闆考慮着要迎合顧客。

sentences.english: My mother was wrapping some banana fritters for a customer.
sentences.chinese: 我母親當時正在爲一位顧客包香蕉煎餅。

sentences.english: We should establish a customer demands value-driven distribution intellectual model.
sentences.chinese: 應建立以顧客的需求價值爲核心的營銷心智模式。

sentences.english: Most stores will allow the purchaser to exchange goods.
sentences.chinese: 大多數商店將允許顧客更換商品。

sentences.english: You can also read "Spend a Day in the Life of your Customer".
sentences.chinese: 你還可以閱讀文章“花一天在你顧客的生活上”。

sentences.english: The store also found that customers were bewildered by cutlery in general.
sentences.chinese: 該公司也顧客們對餐具的用途心存疑惑。

sentences.english: We have celebrity clientele, you know.
Companies adhere to the "customer first, seeking the amount of profit" for the purpose.
sentences.chinese: 公司堅持“顧客至上，以量求利”爲宗旨。

sentences.english: JCI standard can guarantee the best realization of customer's benefit.
sentences.chinese: JCI標準的通過更是保證了顧客利益最大化的實現。

sentences.english: One could always feel fine smell of just-baked bread.
sentences.chinese: 顧客們始終能在麪包店裏聞到新鮮出爐的麪包香味。

sentences.english: I wish you all the best pictures you can get and a ton of happy customers.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心祝願你們都有好前景，收穫一大堆的快樂顧客。

definition: dealer/trader/person engaged in some industry or trade
